description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Area @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]

Defense Fortitude

You chill the hearts and bodies of your foes, dragging them down to absolute zero. Enemies within the area of effect must make a @Check[type:fortitude|against:limit-dc] save. This ice damage negates all resistances and immunities to ice.

Critical Success The target takes @Damage[10[cold]] damage, and the effect on them ends.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and takes @Damage[40[cold]] damage, and the effect on them ends.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and takes @Damage[80[cold]] damage. On the next turn, you may spend an action to force the target to make another save, and afterwards the effect on them ends.

Critical Failure The target is reduced to 0 hit points.
